Wimbledon 2016
programme.desc: Day six from the All England Club, where the third round of the men's and ladies' singles continued in the Grand Slam tournament. There was no doubt as to the main headline on day six last year, which saw defending ladies' champion Petra Kvitova crash out in a thrilling three-set encounter on Centre Court, losing 6-3, 5-7, 4-6 to veteran Jelena Jankovic. Sabine Lisicki, runner-up in 2013, also exited in a one-sided affair to Timea Bacsinszky, and compatriot Angelique Kerber completed a miserable day for German tennis by losing to rising star Garbine Muguruza.(n)

programme.title: Wimbledon 2016
programme.desc: Day six from the All England Club, where the third round of the men's and ladies' singles continued in the Grand Slam tournament. There was no doubt as to the main headline on day six last year, which saw defending ladies' champion Petra Kvitova crash out in a thrilling three-set encounter on Centre Court, losing 6-3, 5-7, 4-6 to veteran Jelena Jankovic. Sabine Lisicki, runner-up in 2013, also exited in a one-sided affair to Timea Bacsinszky, and compatriot Angelique Kerber completed a miserable day for German tennis by losing to rising star Garbine Muguruza.(n)

programme.title: Wimbledon 2016 - Live
programme.desc: Coverage of the matches on day seven at the All England Club, as the second week of the Grand Slam event gets under way. Should the weather have been kind, this day will mark one of the highlights of the fortnight, with the fourth-round matches taking place in the men's and ladies' draws, meaning all of the remaining players will be in action. There were many memorable moments last year, including a clash between Serena and Venus Williams, which younger sister Serena won in straight sets on her way to the title, while Novak Djokovic appeared to be on his way out of the tournament after losing the first two sets to Kevin Anderson. However, the world number one fought back to win the next two before the light gave way, leaving them needing to come back the following day, when Djokovic sealed his place in the quarter-finals.(n)
